actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 96-202.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled, "Special Bridge Replacement Program, Eighth Annual Report to Congress" as a Senate Document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing, as a Senate document, of the report entitled "Special Bridge Replacement Program, Eighth Annual Report to Congress". Directs the printing of 500 additional copies of such document for the use of the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled, "Special Bridge Replacement Program, Eighth Annual Report to Congress" as a Senate Document.
